Uses of Class
io.joshuasalcedo.library.io.core.execute.Execute

Packages that use Execute
Package
Description
io.joshuasalcedo.library.io.core.execute
Provides a fluent API for executing file operations in the file system.

  • Uses of Execute in io.joshuasalcedo.library.io.core.execute

    Deletes all paths.

    Enables dry-run mode where operations are logged but not executed.

    Filters the paths before applying operations.

    Renames files using the provided function.
    Execute

    Allows chaining another set of operations on the current paths.
